Agriculture: The earliest signs of agriculture in Africa were found in the Sahel dating approximately 5000 BCE. They cultivated sorghum and African rice. The guineafowl was also domesticated during this time. Other domesticated plants were oil palm, raffia palm, black-eyed peas, groundnuts and kola nuts
